text: Jerome is an unincorporated community in Appanoose County, Iowa, United States.Iowa Department of Transportation-Appanoose County ==Notable person== Kenneth Owen (1918-2001), Iowa farmer and politician, was born in Jerome.Iowa General Assembly-Kenneth Ervin Owen ==Notes== Category:Unincorporated communities in Appanoose County, Iowa Category:Unincorporated communities in Iowa
title: Jerome, Iowa
